```{r , echo=TRUE}
library(leaflet)

df<-data.frame(lat = runif(100,min = -0.32,max=-0.305),lng = runif(100,min = -78.45,max = -78.43))

df%>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  
  addCircleMarkers()

```
